survey_title: In-clinic Experience of Topical Sunscreen in Paediatric
description: We request you to provide your valuable feedback based on your clinical experience regarding the usage pattern of topical sunscreen in the paediatric category.

questions.question: How often do you recommend sunscreen for infants and toddlers in your clinical practice?
At what minimum age do you typically advise starting sunscreen use in babies?
options: I do not recommend sunscreen for babies

questions.question: Under which conditions or indications do you usually recommend sunscreen for babies?
options: Post-treatment for skin conditions (e.g., after topical steroids)

questions.question: What key factors do you consider while recommending a baby sunscreen?
